getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: Learn how to install Magic Framework in your Flutter project. Quick setup with CLI or manual configuration. Get started building Laravel-style Flutter apps in minutes.

getting-started/configuration.title: Configuration
getting-started/configuration.description: Configure your Magic Framework application using environment variables and config files. Learn about the Config facade, .env files, and dot notation access patterns.

getting-started/directory-structure.title: Directory Structure
getting-started/directory-structure.description: Understand the Laravel-inspired directory structure of Magic Framework. Learn where to place controllers, views, models, and configuration files.

getting-started/service-providers.title: Service Providers
getting-started/service-providers.description: Master Service Providers in Magic Framework. Learn how to register services, boot dependencies, and extend the framework with custom providers.

architecture/facades.title: Facades
architecture/facades.description: Learn about Magic Framework facades - static proxies to underlying services. Access Auth, Cache, Config, Http, Route, Storage and more with clean, testable syntax.

architecture/request-lifecycle.title: Request Lifecycle
architecture/request-lifecycle.description: Understand how Magic Framework boots and handles navigation. Learn the complete lifecycle from app initialization through provider registration to route resolution.

architecture/service-container.title: Service Container
architecture/service-container.description: Master the Magic Framework service container for dependency injection. Learn binding, resolution, singletons, and controller management.

basics/routing.title: Routing
basics/routing.description: Define routes in Magic Framework using Laravel-style syntax. Learn about route groups, layouts, parameters, middleware, and context-free navigation.

basics/middleware.title: Middleware
basics/middleware.description: Create and use middleware in Magic Framework. Protect routes, handle authentication, and intercept navigation with Laravel-style middleware patterns.

basics/controllers.title: Controllers
basics/controllers.description: Build controllers in Magic Framework with state management, validation handling, and view rendering. Learn MagicController patterns for clean architecture.

basics/views.title: Views
basics/views.description: Create views with MagicView and MagicStatefulView. Learn about form handling, async state rendering, and controller integration in Magic Framework.

basics/http-client.title: HTTP Client
basics/http-client.description: Make HTTP requests with the Magic Http facade. Learn about GET, POST, PUT, DELETE requests, file uploads, response handling, and interceptors.

basics/forms.title: Forms
basics/forms.description: Build forms with MagicFormData. Learn about form validation, error handling, controller binding, and server-side error integration.

basics/ui-helpers.title: UI Helpers
basics/ui-helpers.description: Show snackbars, dialogs, toasts, and loading indicators without BuildContext. Use Magic.success(), Magic.error(), Magic.dialog() and more.

security/authentication.title: Authentication
security/authentication.description: Implement authentication in Magic Framework with guards, token management, auto-refresh, and route protection. Support for multiple auth providers.

security/authorization.title: Authorization
security/authorization.description: Control access with Gate and Policies in Magic Framework. Learn role-based permissions, ability checks, and the MagicCan widget.

security/encryption.title: Encryption
security/encryption.description: Encrypt and decrypt data with the Crypt facade. Learn about config-based and device-based encryption using AES-256-CBC in Magic Framework.

security/vault.title: Vault (Secure Storage)
security/vault.description: Store sensitive data securely with the Vault facade. Uses platform-native secure storage (Keychain, EncryptedSharedPreferences) in Magic Framework.

database/getting-started.title: Database: Getting Started
database/getting-started.description: Work with SQLite databases in Magic Framework. Learn raw queries, query builder basics, and database configuration for local data persistence.

database/migrations.title: Database Migrations
database/migrations.description: Create and manage database migrations with Schema builder. Define tables, columns, indexes, and handle schema changes in Magic Framework.

database/seeding.title: Database Seeding
database/seeding.description: Seed your database with test data using Seeders and Factories. Generate fake data with Faker methods for development and testing.

database/query-builder.title: Query Builder
database/query-builder.description: Build database queries with fluent chainable methods. Select, where, join, order, and aggregate data with Magic Framework query builder.

eloquent/getting-started.title: Eloquent: Getting Started
eloquent/getting-started.description: Define models with Eloquent ORM in Magic Framework. Learn about attribute casting, fillable properties, CRUD operations, and hybrid persistence.

eloquent/mutators.title: Eloquent: Mutators & Casts
eloquent/mutators.description: Transform model attributes with accessors, mutators, and automatic type casting. Cast to datetime, json, bool, and custom types.

eloquent/serialization.title: Eloquent: Serialization
eloquent/serialization.description: Serialize models to arrays and JSON. Control output with hidden, visible, and appends properties. Build clean API responses.

digging-deeper/validation.title: Validation
digging-deeper/validation.description: Validate user input with built-in rules like Required, Email, Min, Max. Handle server-side errors and create custom validation rules.

digging-deeper/cache.title: Cache
digging-deeper/cache.description: Cache data with the Cache facade. Use remember pattern, TTL expiration, and multiple cache drivers for performance optimization.

digging-deeper/localization.title: Localization
digging-deeper/localization.description: Translate your app with JSON language files. Use trans() helper for context-free translations. Support multiple languages in Magic Framework.

digging-deeper/events.title: Events
digging-deeper/events.description: Dispatch and listen to events in Magic Framework. Decouple application logic with event-driven architecture and framework lifecycle events.

digging-deeper/carbon.title: Carbon (Date/Time)
digging-deeper/carbon.description: Manipulate dates and times with Carbon. Parse, format, compare, and calculate differences with human-readable output like diffForHumans().

digging-deeper/logging.title: Logging
digging-deeper/logging.description: Log messages with the Log facade using RFC 5424 levels. Configure channels, create custom drivers, and send logs to console, files, or remote services.

digging-deeper/file-storage.title: File Storage
digging-deeper/file-storage.description: Store and retrieve files with the Storage facade. Manage local files, get URLs, download files, and work with multiple disk configurations.

digging-deeper/file-picker.title: File Picker
digging-deeper/file-picker.description: Pick images, videos, and files with the Pick facade. Capture from camera, select from gallery, and work with MagicFile for uploads and storage.

packages/magic-cli.title: Magic CLI
packages/magic-cli.description: Generate code with Magic CLI. Create models, controllers, views, migrations with artisan-like commands. Use Magic Boost for AI-powered development.

packages/wind-ui.title: Wind UI
packages/wind-ui.description: Style Flutter widgets with Tailwind CSS-like utility classes. Use WDiv, WText, WButton with className strings for rapid UI development.

testing/getting-started.title: Testing: Getting Started
testing/getting-started.description: Write tests for Magic Framework applications. Set up testing environment, test controllers, models, and mock dependencies.

testing/http-tests.title: HTTP Tests
testing/http-tests.description: Test HTTP requests and responses. Mock API calls, verify request data, and test authentication flows in Magic Framework.

testing/database-testing.title: Database Testing
testing/database-testing.description: Test database operations with factories and assertions. Use in-memory databases, seed test data, and verify model persistence.

contributing/contribution-guide.title: Contribution Guide
contributing/contribution-guide.description: Contribute to Magic Framework. Learn coding standards, testing requirements, and pull request guidelines for the open source project.

prologue/release-notes.title: Release Notes
prologue/release-notes.description: View the latest Magic Framework release notes. Track new features, improvements, bug fixes, and breaking changes across versions.

prologue/upgrade-guide.title: Upgrade Guide
prologue/upgrade-guide.description: Upgrade your Magic Framework installation to the latest version. Migration steps, breaking changes, and compatibility notes.
